original_text:
Enchanted Eyes
Le slot online di Ainsworth sono famose per il loro stile distintivo e la loro grafica di alta qualità e Enchanted Eyes non fa eccezione. Inoltre, questo titolo fa parte dei giochi Big Hit Bonanza di Ainsworth. Ciò significa che è pieno di bonus e modi extra per vincere, inclusi respins e moltiplicatori. Queste caratteristiche assicurano che questa non sia solo una banale  slot a tema egiziano, ma un’esperienza davvero variegata ed emozionante per qualsiasi giocatore! Scopri di più nei prossimi paragrafi.
Tema di Enchanted Eyes
Ogni fan delle slot machine deve aver visitato l’antico Egitto giocando online. L’atmosfera misteriosa e i preziosi tesori nascosti nelle piramidi dei faraoni rendono le partite sempre molto emozionanti. In questa slot in particolare, dal primo momento in cui si apre la schermata di caricamento, sarai catturato dalla grafica incantevole di uno sguardo magnetico di una principessa. L’ambientazione notturna e i rulli ricoperti da una sorta di papiro ingiallito completano il layout molto curato. Altri simboli includono una moltitudine di tesori in oro scintillante.
Come si gioca a Enchanted Eyes?
A prima vista, questa è una slot piuttosto standard. Ha5 rulli che offrono 25 linee di pagamento. Dopo aver utilizzato il regolatore della scommessa nella parte inferiore destra dello schermo, utilizzando le frecce su entrambi i lati della scommessa corrente o premendo il pulsante Puntata massima, per scegliere la puntata tra 1 e 40, puoi fare clic su Gira. Se non ti va di stare seduto e dover costantemente fare clic, puoi utilizzare la funzione di riproduzione automatica. Dopo aver scelto la tua scommessa al tuo livello preferito, puoi impostare il gioco automatico per effettuare  fino a 100 giri.  L’RTP per Enchanted Eyes è dichiarato del 94,31%, il che significa che potresti vincere 94,31 euro per ogni 100 euro che scommetti.
Quali sono i simboli speciali a cui prestare attenzione?

La Principessa – Questa icona rappresenta il simbolo Wild e può prendere il posto di qualsiasi altra icona per aiutarti a completare una linea vincente. Le uniche eccezioni sono il bonus e lo scatter. La principessa non appare mai sul primo rullo, solo sui rulli 2,3,4,5 ed è esclusiva dei giochi a pagamento;
La Piramide Egiziana- Questo simbolo è lo Scatter ed è esclusiva dei giochi a pagamento, per il secondo, il terzo, il quarto rullo. Ci vogliono sei o più scatter per attivare le vittorie di Pyramid Scatter e la funzione Big Hit;
Simbolo Bonus – Esso appare sui rulli 2, 3, 4. Abbina tre di queste icone e verrà attivato uno dei bonus disponibili. I simboli bonus aumentano se aumenti la tua scommessa, quindi scegli con cura il valore della tua giocata.

Quali sono le caratteristiche bonus di Enchanted Eyes?
Come già anticipato, essendo questa slot uno dei giochi Big Hit Bonanza, è farcita di  numerosi bonus per aumentare sia l’entusiasmo che le vincite. Puoi attivarli colpendo almeno sei scatter e c’è sempre la possibilità di riattivarli mentre i bonus sono in gioco. Durante i round bonus, la tabella dei pagamenti standard non viene applicata.
In cosa consiste la Funzionalità Big Hit?
Nella funzione Big Hit, ti verranno assegnati uno o due giochi gratuiti per ogni scatter che ha attivato la funzione. Questi giochi gratuiti verranno aggiunti a un contatore. Ti verranno anche dati 3 respins gratis. La funzione Big Hit termina quando hai esaurito tutte le tue giocate free o vinci il Gran Premio. Durante la funzione Big Hit, tutti i tuoi scatter attivanti saranno bloccati in posizione. La stessa cosa accadrà a qualsiasi nuovo scatter attivato durante la funzione, che ripristinerà anche i tuoi respins gratuiti a tre. Ogni nuovo scatter ha un suo premio casuale di 1, 2, 3 ,5, 10, 25 o 50. Questi verranno aggiunti al contatore delle vincite. Riceverai i tuoi premi casuali alla fine della funzione Big Hit, quando sarai anche in grado di accedere ai tuoi giochi gratuiti.
Bonus extra Big Hit Feature
La funzione Big Hit extra bonus può essere attivata casualmente in qualsiasi momento della partita a pagamento, a meno che non si stia utilizzando la funzione Big Hit o il Gran Premio. Come il Big Hit, arriva anche con 3 respins. Inoltre, apparirà uno scatter gigante, per un totale di nove scatter, sul secondo, terzo e quarto rullo. I nuovi scatter che compaiono durante la funzione verranno bloccati in posizione, ognuno dei quali assegnerà un premio casuale di 1, 2, 3 ,5 ,10, 25 o 50 da aggiungere al contatore delle vincite. Per la funzione Big Hit extra bonus, puoi vincere la tua scommessa moltiplicata per due e tra nove e 18 giochi gratuiti. Come nella funzione Big Hit, questi giochi gratuiti verranno aggiunti al contatore del gioco gratuito per essere assegnati alla fine della funzione Big Hit extra bonus.
IMPORTANTE! – Puoi ottenere premi bonus abbinando il simbolo bonus almeno tre volte. I premi bonus sono Mini, Minori e Maggiori, ognuno con un premio totale più elevato. Il tipo di bonus che vinci è casuale, ma la tua possibilità di abbinare il simbolo del bonus aumenta se hai una scommessa più alta.
I giochi gratis di Enchanted Eyes
I giochi gratuiti possono essere assegnati dalla funzione Big Hit e dalla funzione Extra Hit Big Hit. Questo vale per uno o due giochi per scatter nel Big Hit e da nove a 18 giochi gratuiti dalla funzione Extra Hit Big Hit. Durante i giochi gratuiti, Princess Wild e Princess Bonus appariranno entrambi sul secondo, terzo e quarto rullo, ma non sui rulli uno e cinque. Il Bonus Princess può anche sostituire qualsiasi altro simbolo, mentre il Princess Wild può sostituire qualsiasi simbolo tranne il Bonus Princess. C’è anche una nuova tabella dei pagamenti, spesso con premi più alti per ciascun simbolo. I bonus possono essere attivati ​​nei giochi gratuiti colpendo il bonus Princess, in modo simile al bonus nel gioco base. Per quattro o cinque simboli Bonus principessa, vinci il mini bonus. Per sei o sette, vinci il bonus minore. Il massimo richiede otto o nove

raw_translation.response:
Enchanted Eyes
Ainsworth's online slots are renowned for their distinctive style and high-quality graphics, and Enchanted Eyes is no exception. Moreover, this title is part of Ainsworth's Big Hit Bonanza games. This means it's packed with bonuses and extra ways to win, including respins and multipliers. These features ensure that this is not just a mere Egyptian-themed slot, but a truly varied and exciting experience for any player! Learn more in the following paragraphs.

Theme of Enchanted Eyes
Every slot machine fan must have visited ancient Egypt while playing online. The mysterious atmosphere and the precious treasures hidden in the pharaohs' pyramids make the games always very exciting. In this slot in particular, from the moment the loading screen opens, you will be captivated by the enchanting graphics of a princess' magnetic gaze. The nighttime setting and reels covered with a kind of yellowed papyrus complete the very well-crafted layout. Other symbols include a multitude of sparkling gold treasures.

How to Play Enchanted Eyes?
At first glance, this is a rather standard slot. It has 5 reels that offer 25 paylines. After using the bet controller in the bottom right of the screen, using the arrows on either side of the current bet or pressing the Max Bet button, to choose the bet between 1 and 40, you can click Spin. If you don't feel like sitting and having to constantly click, you can use the autoplay feature. After choosing your bet at your preferred level, you can set the autoplay game to play up to 100 spins. The RTP for Enchanted Eyes is stated to be 94.31%, which means you could win € 94.31 for every € 100 you bet.

What are the special symbols to watch out for?

The Princess – This icon represents the Wild symbol and can take the place of any other icon to help you complete a winning line. The only exceptions are the bonus and scatter. The princess never appears on the first reel, only on reels 2, 3, 4, 5 and is exclusive to pay-to-play games;
The Egyptian Pyramid - This symbol is the Scatter and is exclusive to pay-to-play games, for the second, third, fourth reels. It takes six or more scatters to activate the Pyramid Scatter wins and Big Hit feature;
Bonus Symbol – It appears on reels 2, 3, 4. Match three of these icons and one of the available bonuses will be activated. Bonus symbols increase if you increase your bet, so choose your play value carefully.

What are Enchanted Eyes' bonus features?
As already anticipated, being this slot one of the Big Hit Bonanza games, it is stuffed with numerous bonuses to increase both enthusiasm and winnings. You can activate them by hitting at least six scatters, and there is always a chance to reactivate them while the bonuses are in play. During bonus rounds, the standard paytable is not applied.

What is the Big Hit Feature?
In the Big Hit feature, you will be awarded one or two free games for every scatter that activated the feature. These free games will be added to a counter. You will also be given 3 free respins. The Big Hit feature ends when you have used up all your free spins or win the Grand Prize. During the Big Hit feature, all of your triggering scatters will be locked in place. The same thing will happen to any new scatter triggered during the feature, which will also restore your free respins to three. Each new scatter has its own random prize of 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 25 or 50. These will be added to the winnings counter. You'll receive your random prizes at the end of the Big Hit feature, when you'll also be able to access your free games.

Big Hit Extra Bonus Feature
The Big Hit extra bonus feature can be randomly activated at any point in the pay-to-play game unless you're using the Big Hit feature or the Grand Prize. As with the Big Hit, it also comes with 3 respins. Additionally, a giant scatter will appear, for a total of nine scatters, on the second, third, and fourth reels. The new scatters that appear during the feature will be locked in place, each of which will award a random prize of 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 25, or 50 to add to the winnings counter. For the Big Hit extra bonus feature, you can win your bet multiplied by two and between nine and 18 free games. As in the Big Hit feature, these free games will be added to the free game counter to be awarded at the end of the Big Hit extra bonus feature.

IMPORTANT! - You can get bonus prizes by matching the bonus symbol at least three times. The bonus prizes are Mini, Minor and Major, each with a higher total prize. The type of bonus you win is random, but your chance of matching the bonus symbol increases if you have a higher bet.

Enchanted Eyes Free Games
Free games can be awarded from the Big Hit feature and the Extra Hit Big Hit feature. This is worth one or two games per scatter in the Big Hit and nine to 18 free games from the Extra Hit Big Hit feature. During the free games, both Princess Wild and Princess Bonus will appear on reels 2, 3, and 4, but not on reels 1 and 5. The Princess Bonus can also replace any other symbol, while the Princess Wild can replace any symbol except the Bonus Princess. There is also a new paytable, often with higher prizes for each symbol. Bonuses can be activated in free games by hitting the Bonus Princess, similar to the bonus in the base game. For four or five Bonus Princess symbols, win the mini bonus. For six or seven, win the minor bonus. The maximum requires eight or nine.

message.content:
Enchanted Eyes is yet another standout title from Ainsworth's line-up of online slots, with their distinct style and high-quality graphics. And what's more, this one is part of the Big Hit Bonanza games! That means loads of bonuses and extra ways to win, including respins and multipliers. So don't underestimate this as just another standard Egyptian theme slot, as it offers a truly diverse and exciting experience for all players! Read on to find out more.

Enchanted Eyes Theme
Any self-respecting slots enthusiast must have explored ancient Egypt online. The mysterious atmosphere and precious treasures hidden in the pharaohs' pyramids make gameplay thrilling. And with this slot, you'll be immediately drawn in from the very first moment you lay eyes on the stunning graphics of Princess's magnetic gaze. Set against a night-time backdrop, with the reels adorned in what looks like aged papyrus, the overall layout is wonderfully designed. Other symbols include a plethora of treasures in shimmering gold.

How to Play Enchanted Eyes
At first glance, this may seem like a fairly standard slot: 5 reels offering 25 paylines, and a betting controller in the bottom right corner to adjust your wager between 1 and 40. But don't worry, there are some added features to keep things interesting! You can click on the Spin button or use the Autoplay function to automatically set up to 100 spins. The RTP for Enchanted Eyes is 94.31%, so there's a chance you could win €94.31 for every €100 wagered.

Special Symbols to Look Out For
The Princess - This icon represents the Wild symbol and can substitute for any other icon to help you complete a winning line. The only exceptions are the Bonus and Scatter symbols. The princess only appears on reels 2, 3, 4, and 5, and is exclusive to the payline games.
The Egyptian Pyramid - This symbol is the Scatter and can only appear on reels 2, 3, and 4 in payline games. You need six or more Scatters to trigger Pyramid Scatter wins and the Big Hit feature.
Bonus Symbol - This appears on reels 2, 3, and 4. Match three of these icons to activate one of the available bonuses. The Bonus symbols increase if you increase your bet, so choose your wagering carefully.

Enchanted Eyes' Bonus Features
As previously mentioned, being part of the Big Hit Bonanza games, this slot is loaded with numerous bonuses to increase both excitement and winnings. You can trigger them by hitting at least six Scatter symbols, and there's always a chance of re-triggering them while in play. During bonus rounds, the standard paytable isn't applied.

What Is the Big Hit Feature?
In the Big Hit feature, you'll be given one or two free games for every Scatter that activated the feature. These free games will be added to a counter, and you'll also be given three free respins. The Big Hit feature ends when you've run out of free games or you win the Grand Prize. During the Big Hit feature, all your activating Scatters will be locked in position. The same goes for any new Scatters that activate during the feature, which will also restore your free respins to three. Every new Scatter has a random prize of 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 25, or 50, which will be added to your winnings counter. You'll receive your random prizes at the end of the Big Hit feature when you can also access your free games.

Extra Big Hit Feature
The Extra Big Hit feature can be randomly activated at any point in a payline game, unless you're using the Big Hit feature or Grand Prize. Like the Big Hit, you'll get three respins, but this time there will also be a giant Scatter appearing for a total of nine Scatters on reels 2, 3, and 4. Any new Scatters that appear during the feature will be locked in position, each of which will award a random prize of 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 25, or 50 to add to your winnings counter. For the Extra Big Hit feature, you can win your bet multiplied by two and between nine and 18 free games. Like the Big Hit feature, these free games will be added to your free game counter to be awarded at the end of the Extra Big Hit feature.

IMPORTANT! - You can win bonus prizes by matching the Bonus symbol at least thrice. The bonus prizes are Mini, Minor, and Major, each with a higher total prize. The type of bonus you win is random, but your chance of matching the Bonus symbol increases with a higher bet.

Enchanted Eyes' Free Games
Free games can be awarded from the Big Hit feature and the Extra Hit Big Hit feature. This includes one or two games per Scatter in Big Hit and nine to 18 free games from the Extra Hit Big Hit feature. During the free games, both Princess Wild and Princess Bonus will appear on reels 2, 3, and 4, but not on reels 1 and 5. The Princess Bonus can substitute any other symbol, while the Princess Wild can substitute any symbol except the Bonus Princess. There's also a new paytable, often with higher prizes for each symbol. Bonuses can be activated in free games by hitting the Bonus Princess, similar to the bonus in the base game. For four or five Bonus Princess symbols, you win the mini bonus. For six or seven, you win the minor bonus. The highest requires eight or nine.

Review: Enchanted Eyes
Ainsworth's online slots are renowned for their distinctive style and high-quality graphics, and Enchanted Eyes is no exception. Moreover, this title is part of Ainsworth's Big Hit Bonanza games. This means it's packed with bonuses and extra ways to win, including respins and multipliers. These features ensure that this is not just a mere Egyptian-themed slot, but a truly varied and exciting experience for any player! Learn more in the following paragraphs.

Theme of Enchanted Eyes
Every slot machine fan must have visited ancient Egypt while playing online. The mysterious atmosphere and the precious treasures hidden in the pharaohs' pyramids make the games always very exciting. In this slot in particular, from the moment the loading screen opens, you will be captivated by the enchanting graphics of a princess' magnetic gaze. The nighttime setting and reels covered with a kind of yellowed papyrus complete the very well-crafted layout. Other symbols include a multitude of sparkling gold treasures.

How to Play Enchanted Eyes?
At first glance, this is a rather standard slot. It has 5 reels that offer 25 paylines. After using the bet controller in the bottom right of the screen, using the arrows on either side of the current bet or pressing the Max Bet button, to choose the bet between 1 and 40, you can click Spin. If you don't feel like sitting and having to constantly click, you can use the autoplay feature. After choosing your bet at your preferred level, you can set the autoplay game to play up to 100 spins. The RTP for Enchanted Eyes is stated to be 94.31%, which means you could win € 94.31 for every € 100 you bet.

What are the special symbols to watch out for?

The Princess – This icon represents the Wild symbol and can take the place of any other icon to help you complete a winning line. The only exceptions are the bonus and scatter. The princess never appears on the first reel, only on reels 2, 3, 4, 5 and is exclusive to pay-to-play games;
The Egyptian Pyramid - This symbol is the Scatter and is exclusive to pay-to-play games, for the second, third, fourth reels. It takes six or more scatters to activate the Pyramid Scatter wins and Big Hit feature;
Bonus Symbol – It appears on reels 2, 3, 4. Match three of these icons and one of the available bonuses will be activated. Bonus symbols increase if you increase your bet, so choose your play value carefully.

What are Enchanted Eyes' bonus features?
As already anticipated, being this slot one of the Big Hit Bonanza games, it is stuffed with numerous bonuses to increase both enthusiasm and winnings. You can activate them by hitting at least six scatters, and there is always a chance to reactivate them while the bonuses are in play. During bonus rounds, the standard paytable is not applied.

What is the Big Hit Feature?
In the Big Hit feature, you will be awarded one or two free games for every scatter that activated the feature. These free games will be added to a counter. You will also be given 3 free respins. The Big Hit feature ends when you have used up all your free spins or win the Grand Prize. During the Big Hit feature, all of your triggering scatters will be locked in place. The same thing will happen to any new scatter triggered during the feature, which will also restore your free respins to three. Each new scatter has its own random prize of 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 25 or 50. These will be added to the winnings counter. You'll receive your random prizes at the end of the Big Hit feature, when you'll also be able to access your free games.

Big Hit Extra Bonus Feature
The Big Hit extra bonus feature can be randomly activated at any point in the pay-to-play game unless you're using the Big Hit feature or the Grand Prize. As with the Big Hit, it also comes with 3 respins. Additionally, a giant scatter will appear, for a total of nine scatters, on the second, third, and fourth reels. The new scatters that appear during the feature will be locked in place, each of which will award a random prize of 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 25, or 50 to add to the winnings counter. For the Big Hit extra bonus feature, you can win your bet multiplied by two and between nine and 18 free games. As in the Big Hit feature, these free games will be added to the free game counter to be awarded at the end of the Big Hit extra bonus feature.

IMPORTANT! - You can get bonus prizes by matching the bonus symbol at least three times. The bonus prizes are Mini, Minor and Major, each with a higher total prize. The type of bonus you win is random, but your chance of matching the bonus symbol increases if you have a higher bet.

Enchanted Eyes Free Games
Free games can be awarded from the Big Hit feature and the Extra Hit Big Hit feature. This is worth one or two games per scatter in the Big Hit and nine to 18 free games from the Extra Hit Big Hit feature. During the free games, both Princess Wild and Princess Bonus will appear on reels 2, 3, and 4, but not on reels 1 and 5. The Princess Bonus can also replace any other symbol, while the Princess Wild can replace any symbol except the Bonus Princess. There is also a new paytable, often with higher prizes for each symbol. Bonuses can be activated in free games by hitting the Bonus Princess, similar to the bonus in the base game. For four or five Bonus Princess symbols, win the mini bonus. For six or seven, win the minor bonus. The maximum requires eight or nine.

These features ensure that this is not just a mere Egyptian-themed slot, but a truly varied and exciting experience for any player! Learn more in the following paragraphs.

Theme of Enchanted Eyes
Every slot machine fan must have visited ancient Egypt while playing online. The mysterious atmosphere and the precious treasures hidden in the pharaohs' pyramids make the games always very exciting. In this slot in particular, from the moment the loading screen opens, you will be captivated by the enchanting graphics of a princess' magnetic gaze. The nighttime setting and reels covered with a kind of yellowed papyrus complete the very well-crafted layout. Other symbols include a multitude of sparkling gold treasures.

How to Play Enchanted Eyes?
At first glance, this is a rather standard slot. It has 5 reels that offer 25 paylines. After using the bet controller in the bottom right of the screen, using the arrows on either side of the current bet or pressing the Max Bet button, to choose the bet between 1 and 40, you can click Spin. If you don't feel like sitting and having to constantly click, you can use the autoplay feature. After choosing your bet at your preferred level, you can set the autoplay game to play up to 100 spins. The RTP for Enchanted Eyes is stated to be 94.31%, which means you could win € 94.31 for every € 100 you bet.

What are the special symbols to watch out for?

The Princess – This icon represents the Wild symbol and can take the place of any other icon to help you complete a winning line. The only exceptions are the bonus and scatter. The princess never appears on the first reel, only on reels 2, 3, 4, 5 and is exclusive to pay-to-play games;
The Egyptian Pyramid - This symbol is the Scatter and is exclusive to pay-to-play games, for the second, third, fourth reels. It takes six or more scatters to activate the Pyramid Scatter wins and Big Hit feature;
Bonus Symbol – It appears on reels 2, 3, 4. Match three of these icons and one of the available bonuses will be activated. Bonus symbols increase if you increase your bet, so choose your play value carefully.

What are Enchanted Eyes' bonus features?
As already anticipated, being this slot one of the Big Hit Bonanza games, it is stuffed with numerous bonuses to increase both enthusiasm and winnings. You can activate them by hitting at least six scatters, and there is always a chance to reactivate them while the bonuses are in play. During bonus rounds, the standard paytable is not applied.

What is the Big Hit Feature?
In the Big Hit feature, you will be awarded one or two free games for every scatter that activated the feature. These free games will be added to a counter. You will also be given 3 free respins. The Big Hit feature ends when you have used up all your free spins or win the Grand Prize. During the Big Hit feature, all of your triggering scatters will be locked in place. The same thing will happen to any new scatter triggered during the feature, which will also restore your free respins to three. Each new scatter has its own random prize of 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 25 or 50. These will be added to the winnings counter. You'll receive your random prizes at the end of the Big Hit feature, when you'll also be able to access your free games.

Big Hit Extra Bonus Feature
The Big Hit extra bonus feature can be randomly activated at any point in the pay-to-play game unless you're using the Big Hit feature or the Grand Prize. As with the Big Hit, it also comes with 3 respins. Additionally, a giant scatter will appear, for a total of nine scatters, on the second, third, and fourth reels. The new scatters that appear during the feature will be locked in place, each of which will award a random prize of 1, 2, 3, 5, 10, 25, or 50 to add to the winnings counter. For the Big Hit extra bonus feature, you can win your bet multiplied by two and between nine and 18 free games. As in the Big Hit feature, these free games will be added to the free game counter to be awarded at the end of the Big Hit extra bonus feature.

IMPORTANT! - You can get bonus prizes by matching the bonus symbol at least three times. The bonus prizes are Mini, Minor and Major, each with a higher total prize. The type of bonus you win is random, but your chance of matching the bonus symbol increases if you have a higher bet.

Enchanted Eyes Free Games
Free games can be awarded from the Big Hit feature and the Extra Hit Big Hit feature. This is worth one or two games per scatter in the Big Hit and nine to 18 free games from the Extra Hit Big Hit feature. During the free games, both Princess Wild and Princess Bonus will appear on reels 2, 3, and 4, but not on reels 1 and 5. The Princess Bonus can also replace any other symbol, while the Princess Wild can replace any symbol except the Bonus Princess. There is also a new paytable, often with higher prizes for each symbol. Bonuses can be activated in free games by hitting the Bonus Princess, similar to the bonus in the base game. For four or five Bonus Princess symbols, win the mini bonus. For six or seven, win the minor bonus. The maximum requires eight or nine.
